- [ ] I understand token listing is not required to use the WarpX Interface with a token.
- [ ] I understand filing an issue or adding liquidity does not guarantee addition to the WarpX default token list.
- [ ] I will not ping the Discord about this listing request.
- [ ] I understand ETH and USDM are currently the only trusted base assets for WarpX default listings.
- [ ] I confirm this token already trades against a trusted base asset in at least one WarpX pool.
- [ ] I confirm there is a WarpX pool with significant amount of liquidity

**Please provide the following information for your token.**

- Token Address:
- Token Name (from contract):
- Token Decimals (from contract):
- Token Symbol (from contract):
- Token Logo URL (preferably to an official source, from where it will not disappear the next day or so):
- WarpX pair address carrying the required liquidity (if applied):
- Link to the official homepage of the token (if any):
- Link to CoinMarketCap/CoinGecko page of token or any other tracker website:
